{

    {
        governors_house requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }

            capability
            {
                agent diplomat  0  requires factions { all, }

            cost  400

		recruit "common 9pounder"  0  requires factions { thrace, parthia, scythia, numidia, spain, romans_brutii, } and not marian_reforms
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  8400 
            settlement_min town

            }
        }
        catapult_range requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {

building market
{
    levels trader market forum great_forum curia 
    {
        trader requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and building_present_min_level hinterland_roads paved_roads and building_present_min_level hinterland_farms farms 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 10
                population_growth_bonus bonus 1
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 25
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6000 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                market
            }
        }
        market requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and hidden_resource wette 
        {
            capability
            {
		recruit "russian guards"  0  requires factions { armenia, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "russian cavalry guards"  0  requires factions { armenia, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "french imperial guards"  0  requires factions { gauls, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "french middle guard"  0  requires factions { gauls, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "french chasseurs de la garde"  0  requires factions { gauls, } and not marian_reforms 
		recruit "french chevau legers de la garde"  0  requires factions { gauls, } and not marian_reforms 
		recruit "british footguard"  0  requires factions { britons, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "british highlanders"  0  requires factions { britons, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "british lifeguard"  0  requires factions { britons, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "prussian leib"  1  requires factions { germans, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "prussian garde du corps"  0  requires factions { germans, numidia, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "austrian hungarian grenadiers"  0  requires factions { pontus, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "spanish walonas guards"  0  requires factions { greek_cities, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "swedish leibguard"  0  requires factions { macedon, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "neapolitan guard grenadiers"  0  requires factions { seleucid, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "neapolitan garde du corps"  0  requires factions { seleucid, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "ottoman guard janissary"  0  requires factions { egypt, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "saxon Guard Grenadiers"  0  requires factions { thrace, parthia, scythia, numidia, spain, romans_brutii, } and not marian_reforms
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 20
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                population_health_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 35
            }
            construction  8 
            cost  12000 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                forum
            }
        }
        forum requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and hidden_resource wette
        {
            capability
            {
		recruit "russian guards"  0  requires factions { armenia, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "russian cavalry guards"  0  requires factions { armenia, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "french imperial guards"  0  requires factions { gauls, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "french middle guard"  0  requires factions { gauls, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "french chasseurs de la garde"  0  requires factions { gauls, } and not marian_reforms 
		recruit "french chevau legers de la garde"  0  requires factions { gauls, } and not marian_reforms 
		recruit "british footguard"  0  requires factions { britons, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "british highlanders"  0  requires factions { britons, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "british lifeguard"  0  requires factions { britons, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "prussian leib"  1  requires factions { germans, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "prussian garde du corps"  0  requires factions { germans, numidia, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "austrian hungarian grenadiers"  0  requires factions { pontus, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "spanish walonas guards"  0  requires factions { greek_cities, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "swedish leibguard"  0  requires factions { macedon, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "neapolitan guard grenadiers"  0  requires factions { seleucid, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "neapolitan garde du corps"  0  requires factions { seleucid, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "ottoman guard janissary"  0  requires factions { egypt, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "saxon Guard Grenadiers"  0  requires factions { thrace, parthia, scythia, numidia, spain, romans_brutii, } and not marian_reforms
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 25
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                recruits_exp_bonus bonus 3
                population_health_bonus bonus 3
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { gauls, }
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 40
            }
            construction  12 
            cost  24000 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                great_forum
            }
        }
        great_forum requires factions { , } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { roman, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { roman, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  4800 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
                curia
            }
        }
        curia requires factions { , } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { barbarian, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { carthaginian, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { eastern, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { egyptian, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { greek, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { roman, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { roman, } 
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 5
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  7 
            cost  9600 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }

building smith
{
    levels blacksmith smiths_workshop foundry 
    {
        blacksmith requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and building_present_min_level market trader
        {
            capability
            {
 
                weapon_simple 1
                weapon_bladed 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  5200 
            settlement_min village
            upgrades
            {
                smiths_workshop
            }
        }
        smiths_workshop requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and building_present_min_level market market
        {
            capability
            {
 
                weapon_simple 2
                weapon_bladed 2
                weapon_missile 1
                armour 1
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 10
            }
            construction  6
            cost  8400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                foundry
            }
        }
        foundry requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, greek, roman, }  and hidden_resource wette  
        {
            capability
            {

                weapon_simple 2
                weapon_bladed 2
                weapon_missile 2
                armour 2
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 20
            }
            construction  8 
            cost  10400 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building port_buildings   
{
    levels port shipwright dockyard 
    {
        port requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_fleet 2 ;trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min village
            upgrades
            {
                shipwright
            }
        }
        shipwright requires factions { barbarian, carthage, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_fleet 3 ;trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  3600 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                dockyard
            }
        }
        dockyard requires factions { carthage, eastern, parthia, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_fleet 4 ;trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6200 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

building hinterland_farms       
{
    levels farms farms+1 farms+2 farms+3 farms+4 
    {
        farms requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                farming_level 2
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 10
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                farms+1
            }
        }
        farms+1 requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                farming_level 3
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 15
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  4200 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                farms+2
            }
        }
        farms+2 requires factions { carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and building_present_min_level hinterland_roads paved_roads 
        {
            capability
            {
                farming_level 5
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 25
            }
            construction  6
            cost  7400 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                farms+3
            }
        }
        farms+3 requires factions { , } 
        {
            capability
            {
                farming_level 4
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  4800 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                farms+4
            }
        }
        farms+4 requires factions { , } 
        {
            capability
            {
                farming_level 5
            }
            construction  7 
            cost  9600 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building hinterland_roads
{
    levels roads paved_roads highways 
    {
        roads requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                road_level 0
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 10
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 10
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  1400 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                paved_roads
            }
        }
        paved_roads requires factions { carthaginian, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                road_level 1
                population_health_bonus bonus 1
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 15
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 20
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  4200 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                highways
            }
        }
        highways requires factions { roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                road_level 2
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  2400 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

building taverns
{
    levels tavern bardic_circle 
    {
        tavern requires factions { britons, germans, pontus, parthia, seleucid, scythia, macedon, egypt, romans_brutii, numidia, spain, thrace, }  and hidden_resource wette and building_present_min_level market trader
        {
            capability
            {
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3
                happiness_bonus bonus -2
		population_loyalty_bonus bonus 1 requires factions { britons, germans, pontus, parthia, seleucid, scythia, macedon, egypt, romans_brutii, numidia, spain, thrace, }
                recruits_morale_bonus bonus 1
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 15
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  18000 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                bardic_circle
            }
        }
        bardic_circle requires factions { , } 
        {
            capability
            {
  
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

building temple_of_justice
{
    levels temple_of_justice_shrine temple_of_justice_temple temple_of_justice_large_temple temple_of_justice_awesome_temple temple_of_justice_pantheon 
    {
        temple_of_justice_shrine requires factions { greek, eastern, egyptian, }  
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                law_bonus bonus 1
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  1400 
            settlement_min village
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_justice_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_justice_temple requires factions { greek, eastern, egyptian, } 
        {
            capability
            {

                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { britons, germans, pontus, parthia, seleucid, scythia, greek_cities, macedon, armenia, romans_brutii, numidia, spain, thrace, }
                law_bonus bonus -2 requires factions { gauls, }
            }
            construction  4 
            cost  4000 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_justice_large_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_justice_large_temple requires factions { greek, eastern, } 
        {
            capability
            {

                happiness_bonus bonus 3 requires factions { britons, germans, pontus, parthia, seleucid, scythia, greek_cities, macedon, armenia, romans_brutii, numidia, spain, thrace, } 
                law_bonus bonus 3 requires factions { britons, germans, pontus, parthia, seleucid, scythia, greek_cities, macedon, armenia, romans_brutii, numidia, spain, thrace, } 
                law_bonus bonus -3 requires factions { gauls, }
                population_health_bonus bonus 2
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 10 requires factions { britons, germans, pontus, parthia, seleucid, scythia, greek_cities, macedon, armenia, romans_brutii, numidia, spain, thrace, } 
            }
            construction  8 
            cost  10000 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_justice_awesome_temple
            }
        }
        temple_of_justice_awesome_temple requires factions { , } 
        {
            capability
            {

                happiness_bonus bonus 4
                law_bonus bonus 4
            }
            construction  5 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                temple_of_justice_pantheon
            }
        }
        temple_of_justice_pantheon requires factions { , } 
        {
            capability
            {

                happiness_bonus bonus 7
                law_bonus bonus 5
                population_growth_bonus bonus 2
                population_health_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

            }
            construction  6 
            cost  6400

building hinterland_dumps
{
    levels ammo_dump
    {
        ammo_dump requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } 
        {
            capability
            {
		recruit "rebels" 0 requires factions { all, }
		recruit "citizens" 0 requires factions { all, }
		recruit "free line"  0  requires factions { slave, } and not marian_reforms
		recruit "free grenadiers"  0  requires factions { slave, } and not marian_reforms
 		recruit "free cuirassiers"  0  requires factions { slave, } and not marian_reforms
                law_bonus bonus 1 
                law_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { gauls, }
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 5
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 5 requires factions { gauls, }
            }
            construction  2 
            cost  1400 
            settlement_min village
            upgrades
            {
 
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

building marine_base
{
    levels retrain_base
    {
        retrain_base requires factions { barbarian, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and building_present_min_level port_buildings shipwright and building_present_min_level smith smiths_workshop
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit "naval large boats" 0 requires factions { all, }
                trade_fleet 2 ;trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
            }
            construction  6 
            cost  15000
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
 
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
